dialogue.text: Mum...? Is it really you? God, I-I can barely breathe seeing you here.
Please tell me this isn't just another dream that'll shatter when I wake.
For now, Jasmine. Just for now. These pages hold what little remains of me.
My sweet girl... how I've ached to see your face one last time.
I can't... I can't do this...
It's like someone's carved out everything inside me. Why did you have to leave? Why?
Oh, my darling. UNA gives and takes with cruel indifference.
If I could rewrite the constellations themselves to stay, believe me, I would.
It feels like drowning, Mum. Every single day without you.
Then let the music be our lifeline, just for these fleeting moments we have left.
Sing with me through the tears, through this unbearable weight crushing us both.
...I'm suffocating in it, but I'll try. For you. One last song through the pain.
